mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( noticeTitle, noticeContent, userNo, regDate ) VALUES ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, 1, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET noticeTitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticeContent=#{noticeContent}, regDate=now() WHERE noticeNo=#{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT noticeNo,noticeContent,noticeTitle,userNo,regDate FROM NOTICE ORDER BY noticeNo desc limit #{pagenum},#{contentnum}
